title: Going to school
creator_credit: David Gibson and Dept of Education, New Zealand
brief_description: Explores a child’s first days at school. This exciting experience has its problems, fears and joys. It also describes the parents and teachers reactions. Suitable for tertiary and teacher levels.
creator_credit_for_label: David Gibson and Dept of Education, New Zealand
